trans-unit.source: Provides the capabilities for matching annotations with the corresponding annotated objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供比對附註與對應標註物件的功能。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo> 中導入[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)]3.5 版。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Consider a simple document reader application that has a comments pane.
trans-unit.target: 請考慮具有註解 窗格的簡單的文件讀取器應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The comments pane might be a list box that displays the text from a list of annotations that are anchored to a document.
trans-unit.target: 註解窗格可能是清單方塊，其中顯示來自錨定到文件之註釋清單的文字。

trans-unit.source: If the user selects an item in the list box, then the application brings into view the paragraph in the document that the corresponding annotation object is anchored to.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者在清單方塊中選取項目，則應用程式會將對應註釋物件所錨定之文件中的段落帶入檢視。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to implement the event handler of such a list box that serves as the comments pane:
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何實作這類做為註解 窗格的清單方塊的事件處理常式：

trans-unit.source: Gets the anchor of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得附註的錨點。

trans-unit.source: The anchor that is resolved.
trans-unit.target: 已解析的錨點。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo.Anchor%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo.Anchor%2A> 中導入[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)]3.5 版。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the annotation object.
trans-unit.target: 取得附註物件。

trans-unit.source: The annotation object.
trans-unit.target: 附註物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo.Annotation%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo.Annotation%2A> 中導入[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)]3.5 版。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that represents the location on the tree where the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo.Anchor" /> is resolved.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，表示樹狀目錄中已解析 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo.Anchor" /> 的位置。

trans-unit.source: The object that represents the location on the tree where the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo.Anchor" /> is resolved.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示樹狀目錄中已解析 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo.Anchor" /> 的位置。

trans-unit.source: The type is specified by the type of the annotated object.
trans-unit.target: 此型別是由標註物件的型別指定。

trans-unit.source: Sticky notes and highlights in flow or fixed documents always resolve to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.TextAnchor" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 非固定格式或固定格式文件中的自黏便箋和醒目提示一定會解析為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.TextAnchor" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo.ResolvedAnchor%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo.ResolvedAnchor%2A> 中導入[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)]3.5 版。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.target: 請考慮具有註解 窗格的簡單的文件讀取器應用程式。

trans-unit.target: 如果使用者在清單方塊中選取項目，則應用程式會將對應註釋物件所錨定之文件中的段落帶入檢視。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to implement the event handler of such a list box that serves as the comments pane:
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何實作這類做為註解 窗格的清單方塊的事件處理常式：
